content.text:
I don't have access to web search functionality. However, I can tell you from my knowledge that the last US penny was minted in 2022. The US Mint stopped penny production after 2022.

The most recent date would be: **2022-12-31**

However, if you need the exact last production date, I'd recommend checking the official US Mint website for the precise information, as my knowledge may not reflect the exact final minting date in 2022.
